replies.replyComment: @Mujum Dar ok.so what qualifications Wimal has got 5 th grade?
@Mandy What are the  qualifications of Ranja or Gonja who is a big  mouth of UNP. We saw him write A/L this time.
@Mandy LTTE Mass Murderers killed over 200,000 Srilankans in their 30 year miserable "Elaam  " War. How do you forget it so soon. Surely you must be a LTTE arse licker

Go to hell you liar. Do not think all people are idiots like you . you cannot cheat people anymore . 
We should have got this result in 2015.01.08   but the  Traitors combine of Sirisena, UNP,JVP, Hela Karumaya and other Sinhala Tigers prevented it. 
We  are happy that Sirisena took an about turn in 2019.But other boot lickers of LTTE, America, and West still remain  there.

Dan sapada ponnaya???  UNP disgusting  traitors are enemies of the state. These disgraceful dogs are run by NGOs and Tamil diaspora. These fuckars should be locked up for crimes against sinhala Buddhist monks

@Mujum Dar It was not done Mahinda alone. There was a team and pretty much whole country behind him. He was forced to fight.However after winning the war Mahinda made Karuna a vice president of SLFP, deputy minister and had parties with him . Do you know Who Karuna was? He has confessed that he massacred 1000 of people including pregnant women and Buddhist monks.very gruesome a d uncivilized killing in living memory. But your so called Mahinda and Gota greeted Karuna and Pillayan with open hands hugged them , dance with them? Only Mahinda could do that , coz he doesn't give f about anyone or anything.hes only concern is himself and his family. Do u think he's  tried patriotic? I don't think so. He committed financial crime you couldn't even imagine. You know why ? Go n fine out his past?how he started his politics, he's just a thug n bully started as a book sorter in a library. No education.just a brutal thug. Robbed the entire nation years to come. Do u think Lalith , Gamini, or Ranjan would ever had parties with Karuna or Pillayan? Now Gota pledges he would release Pillayan.Do you know how Pillayan killed people.he cut pregnant women alive and buldgeoned them.

@Mandy
Do not  fabricate  lies .Marcos was the bossom friend of America. But when he lost Power  America closed the Door for him and Egyption President Hosni Mubarak gave him asylum in Egypt and he died there. So --- lickers of America  beware.
You Level all kinds of Fabricated accusations against Mahinda, simply and only because his regime defeated that Tamil Racist LTTE Brute Prabhakaran and his gang  at Nandikadal Lgoon  on 18/05/2009.
So we know who are Racists as well as Terrorists and Terrorist Supporters in the South.

@MandyYou Level all kinds of Fabricated accusations against Mahinda, simply and only because his regime defeated that Tamil Racist LTTE Brute Prabhakaran and his gang  at Nandikadal Lgoon  on 18/05/2009.
So we know who are Racists as well as Terrorists.

@Mandy You are sadly mistaken when Soniya Gandhi  came to power she was to  be the PM. But she did not accept the PM Post but remained behind and put her Puppet Manmohansingh as PM. All  things Manmohansingh did is just what Soniyaa Gandhi ordered. 
We do not want to reply you . Since you referred  to our comment we  just want  to prove what  we wrote was  the truth.
You Level all kinds of Fabricated accusations against Mahinda, simply and only because his regime defeated that Tamil Racist LTTE Brute Prabhakaran and his gang  at Nandikadal Lgoon  on 18/05/2009.
So we know who are Racists as well as Terrorists.  
Hope You can remember  Amithalingam the elected opposition Leader who lost his Civic rights and had to leave Parliamment  because he refused to take the oath to protect the  unitary state of Srilanka.
So tell us Mudslinging liars  who  are the RACISTS. He is the Father of LTTE , who called Prbhakaran   and the gang as our boys.
His wife was a bundle of Tamil Racism. She was the woman who cried that she can't sleep until she wears shoes made of our skins and Swim in a pool of our blood who lived in the South. So who are the RACISTS  SAVAGES and TERRORISTS.
Ultimately karma decided and he was shot down at his own home in front of his wife by LTTE.
Samething Happened to Dr. Nilam Thiruchelvama , who was the legal Advisor to LTTE , and the man who drafted the Ellaam constitution and many other for Prabahakaran.
He made the mistake of telling the truth " that LTTE leader Prabhakaran's Children are studying at Europian Universities in COMFORT , while poor Tamil child has to go to war front wearing a  CYANIDE CAPSULE round the neck"  He could live only a week after that statement. So who are The Liars  Racists and Terrorists . Let not you but the readers decide.
@Mujum Dar Mahinda=Macos
@Mujum Dar Remember Mahinda s only intent is to make his patti gona(Namal) -hora lawyer president of SL.
@Mujum Dar Mahina had dinner with Karuna who killed thousand of sinhalese and buddhist monks. the only leader who did it in living memory

@Mujum Dar Go back to my writing and read again. I didnt say Sonia Ghandi was in power. I said her party was in power.I think you are a racial fanatic who's so blind to see how Mahina his brothers and three bull dogs(sons) robbed the country  .Remember   the one who robs public money and property is also a terrorist. You don't understand Mahina put country in to a debt hole which will many years to pay off. you know why ? thats in his genres, from inception he was a thug, crook and a bully so ever expect anything other than what hes done. thats what he does best. I think he got rid of LTTE to rob the country which was a adversary to fulfil his dream of making his patti gon Namal president of SL. Remember Mahina is the only leader who had dinner with a terrorist(Karuna) the one who killes 10s of buddhist monks. so still do you think Mahinda really care about sinhalese or country?If he had , he wound have robbed the national interest the way he did? t. Mahinda started his career as a book sorter(labourer) in a university. so dont expect any think miracle from him.

@Mandy  Do not insult the Oxford and Cambridge dictionary authors by misusing the words in these English Dictionaries.
What do yo mean Soniya Gandhi was  in power. It was a  Manmohansigh who was the PM of India from 22nd May 2004 to 26 May 2014.  His government  was so against Mahinda he did not participate In the Commonwealth conference held in Colombo ,Srilanka. India boycotted it. 
So do not utter blatant lies to hood wink the gullible. 
Are you from Andoda?. Then it is useless to engage with you in a discussion.
So forget about us and you may beat about the Bush as you like.
No more comments from us to you.

@Mandy It is very sad to hear this type highly irresponsible saying. 
From  1977 to 2005  J.R , Premdasa, chandhrika, Ranil had many dozens of conferences with LTTE, starting from Thimpu and going round the world , but could not stop the massive devastations committed  by the LTTE.
The interim President Mr .D.B .Wijetunga understood this very clearly  and when those peace talkers suggested him to have a discussion with LTTE he gave that brilliant ansawer -" Kotiya ekka saakachcha karanne , kaevum ,kokis kiribath kannada " kiyaa.  and he directly ordered Security forces to move forward. Ultimately  he managed to Free the almost all the Eastern Province in one ( 1) year of his stay as President.
So no doubt that Government Should NOT discuss with Terrorist Groups like LTTE. 
However the then Defense secretary had a security council meeting on scheduled  basis every week  to review the Security situation in War front and the Country. It is through these discussions that former Defense Secretary controlled the entire situation that ultimately paved the way to eliminate the LTTE Military threat.
So he is a master at discussions.
The current Government stopped these Regular Security meetings. What was the result . On 21 st  April Ester Sunday ,the massacre of the innocents.
So it is this Government who  have proved beyond doubt that they are totally incapable of discussions. 
This again was the cause for the Tug of War between the President and Prime minister and has resulted a complete collapse of  Security , Economy , and Even Sovereignty , Territorial Integrity and Unitary status of Mother Lanka.  
So think wise and do not be led by the statements made by people who work on an unknown agenda .

@Mujum Dar Mahinda was able to win the war becoz Sonia Ghandis party was in power.and she wanted LTTE dead. that's the only reason Mahinda was able to finish it. If India had objected as it did during Vadamara hi , Mahinda was forced to stop. So Mahinda got lucky.if u delve in to Mahinda past he was a  Bully, thug and matta.
@Mujum Dar Gota s thinking is black and white .he was a solider not a politician. He will be very unsuccessful as a politician, coz he is not a good listener
@Mujum Dar Have you forgotten that Gota is an US citizen and the same time u blame west n US.joke
